Armenian
I reinstalled it again and got the same error.
Apparently you when installing "L4D2_Rev_Emu_for_v2050+" you SHOULDN'T CLICK ON "view rev.ini" and just click "close" if that works for you, you still can change your name by going to the folder where you've extracted the game. Click "rev.ini" and change http://bayimg.com/lAalmAadN
(don't delete the brackets) save the changes and launch left4dea2.exe HOPE THIS HELPED!
(note: when uninstalling L4D2_Rev_Emu_for_v2050+ click yes to all when asked to delete or write protected files)

worked like a charm on a virgin W7 32bit system here.

- simply extract
- install Addon Support
- install Rev Emu and exit without opening the rev.ini.
- edit rev.ini
- play the game - even on group servers ; D
